title: Episode 48: "Save Democracy" Mania Part 1 - The Fourth Turning

media:group.media:title: Episode 48: "Save Democracy" Mania Part 1 - The Fourth Turning
media:group.media:description:
You'd have to be living in a bank vault not to catch all the chatter lately about the need to "save democracy". Where did this bumper sticker come from? Here is Part 1...after Donald Trump became president, Steve Bannon's fascination with The Fourth Turning put the book under a microscope. It was never called a "threat to democracy" directly...but that doesn't mean conversations about it then, didn't augur the conversations going on now.

"Political Upheaval by Design", NPR On Point, Boston WBUR affiliate, Apr 11 2017 https://www.wbur.org/onpoint/2017/04/11/fourth-turning-steve-bannon

"Bannon's Views Can be Traced to a Book that Warns, 'Winter is Coming'", Jeremy Peters, The New York Times, Apr 8 2017 https://www.nytimes.com/2017/04/08/us/politics/stephen-bannon-book-fourth-turning.html

"The Outsider as Insider: Steve Bannon, Fourth Turnings, and the Neo-Fascist Threat", www.academia.edu https://www.academia.edu/38989953/_The_Outsider_as_Insider_Steve_Bannon_Fourth_Turnings_and_the_Neo_Fascist_Threat_Chapter_

"The Coming Depression: Imagination in Politics Old and New", joelowndes.org, Apr 10 2020 https://www.joelowndes.org/post/the-coming-depression-politics-old-and-new
